Corpse Man Construction

Summon Units:#534 Corpse Construct
A stream of lightning is channeled into a body composed of several human corpses, reawakening it. The reawakened corpse is mindless and obeys its creator as best it can. A mage equipped with a lightning rod can reawaken additional corpses.
